column5: Just when you thought that the Rapala company has made everything that there is to be made for fishing, comes this great new product. Atta boy Lauri!!

very cool,now that means i gotta try some,   is it available here,or is it in the states...inquiring minds got to know  suddenly im getting thirsty.....im parched...... hey maybe inside every 2-4 there might be a shad-rap or a husky jerk......cool
Adds to the saying grab a rapala and a beer and go camping
seen a photo of a Rapala beer (bock style) a couple of years back in an In-Fisherman mag on the fish recipe page.

I found this item on E Bay searching for Rapala stuff. It's tough to see in the photo, but this beer was made for an annual sales meeting in 2005. I used to collect beer cans as a hobby. In fact I have about 300 mostly full cans tucked away in the basement somewhere. It's common in the USA for beers to be made for a special event. I have several of them. Remember "Billy Beer", from Jimmy Carters brothers fame? I got one of them downstairs.
Too funny!!! Almost makes me wish I liked beer
